snippet.title: New Day: Early Access | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Early Access officially sets a release date as December 25th, 2024.

Early Access is just the beginning to opening up New Day to the public. New Day's Early Access does NOT contain EVERYTHING that the game will have in it. Only around 14% of what we envision the final game to look like. It's mainly here to serve as a concept to what the future holds. Updates for Early Access can be found in the Discord.

Yes, this trailer is dramatic on purpose.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/NewDay408
Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2428440/New_Day/
Discord: https://discord.gg/Xw24MATkun

If you'd like to help New Day and are a modeler, we need environmental, prop, and hairstyle modelers. Contact me on Discord if you're interested! This also applies to 3D animators.

Discord Username: sexyfurbies

New Day does not have an official, final release date yet.

New Day is a Tomodachi Life x The Sims experience that combines factors of both games into one! Wanna build a custom apartment for your islander? You can, with New Day's very own built-in build mode! 

Watch as your island expands and becomes its very own paradise.

! CREDITS !:

Voice Actor: Behon
UI Designer: Timtodile, PotatoPlays, Anemo, Chamilionio, Leilanix, suddenlyalone
Modeler: Timtodile, AjMamoru, Wind, Zii
Animator:  AjMamoru
Composer: LilanDeSilva
Conceptual Creation: NightmareFurbies, Rosie, Anemo, Mime
Programmer / Head Developer: NightmareFurbies
